Does not work with Acekard 2i with AKAIO firmware 1.8.1.  Get the "Cannot access save data, please turn of the DS and reinsert the game card" message.
I also just tried with AKAIO 1.8.5 firmware and got the same message.  It doesn't work with Acekard 2i.
